label: Arms
short_description: Muscles of the upper limb including flexors and extensors.

label: Back
short_description: The posterior torso, primary for pulling movements.

label: Chest
short_description: The anterior upper torso, primary for pushing movements.

label: Core
short_description: Central stability muscles connecting the upper and lower body.

label: Legs
short_description: The lower limbs, responsible for locomotion and power.

label: Shoulders
short_description: The shoulder girdle providing a wide range of arm mobility.

label: Neck
short_description: Muscles supporting the head and cervical spine.

label: Full Body
short_description: Exercises that engage multiple major muscle groups simultaneously.

label: Olympic
short_description: Compound, explosive lifts based on traditional weightlifting.
